snippet: In an interview, Smoltz discussed the tournament, Tommy John surgery and what he would have been if he hadn’t been a pitcher....

headline.main: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'
headline.print_headline: Alabama City to Re-enact March That Sparked 'Bloody Sunday'

lead_paragraph: In an interview, Smoltz discussed the tournament, Tommy John surgery and what he would have been if he hadn’t been a pitcher.
